body_html: @fmassa A more efficient method to accelerate basic operations is implemented. Could you spare time to review the code? The benchmark has also updated. We will pull a new request to modify the TH_OMP_OVERHEAD_THRESHOLD value later. Thanks a lot.
body_text: @fmassa A more efficient method to accelerate basic operations  is implemented. Could you spare time to review the code?  The benchmark has also updated. We will pull a new request to modify the  TH_OMP_OVERHEAD_THRESHOLD value  later. Thanks a lot.
body: @fmassa A more efficient method to accelerate basic operations  is implemented. Could you spare time to review the code?  The [benchmark](https://github.com/zy97140/omp-benchmark-for-pytorch) has also updated. We will pull a new request to modify the  ```TH_OMP_OVERHEAD_THRESHOLD``` value  later. Thanks a lot.
